processing_level_description_presence_ch.failure: No Processing Level Description is provided

help.message: Use the EOSDIS Data Processing Level descriptions as guidance.

processing_level_description_presence_ch.remediation: Recommend providing a detailed processing level description as per EOSDIS data standards.

help.message: Recommend providing the updated contact information as per the data product.

shortname_uniqueness.remediation: Recommend providing a more descriptive title for the collection.
